fields.name: ConsumerGroupName
fields.description: The name of the event hub's consumer group that holds the partitions from which events will be read.

fields.name: CreationTime
fields.description: The time the resource was created.

fields.name: EventHubName
fields.description: The name of the event hub.

fields.name: EventSourceResourceId
fields.description: The resource id of the event source in Azure Resource Manager.

fields.name: IngressStartAt
fields.description: An object that contains the details about the starting point in time to ingest events.

fields.name: KeyName
fields.description: The name of the SAS key that grants the Time Series Insights service access to the event hub. The shared access policies for this key must grant 'Listen' permissions to the event hub.

fields.name: LocalTimestamp
fields.description: An object that represents the local timestamp property. It contains the format of local timestamp that needs to be used and the corresponding timezone offset information. If a value isn't specified for localTimestamp, or if null, then the local timestamp will not be ingressed with the events.

fields.name: ServiceBusNamespace
fields.description: The name of the service bus that contains the event hub.

fields.name: TimestampPropertyName
fields.description: The event property that will be used as the event source's timestamp. If a value isn't specified for timestampPropertyName, or if null or empty-string is specified, the event creation time will be used.
